high_descs: Turn around walk towards to sofa.
Pick up the knife from the bed.
Turn right and move towards to desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the knife from the bed and turn on the desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the bed
pick the knife from the bed
Turn right towards the desk lamp
switch on the desk lamp to view the knife
anns.task_desc: switch on the desk lamp to view the knife

high_descs: Turn left and head straight, turn left and go straight to the bed
pick up a knife from bed
Turn right and head straight to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a knife by the light of a desk lamp.
